One Model To Learn Them All

A single model is presented that yields good results across multiple domains and tasks, including image classification, translation, image captioning, speech recognition, and English parsing. The model architecture incorporates building blocks from multiple domains and demonstrates improved performance on all tasks when adding non-crucial blocks.

Key Concepts:

  • Multi-domain model
  • Concurrent training
  • Transfer learning
  • Architecture of the MultiModel
  • Sequence to Sequence Models
  • Convolutional Blocks
  • Autoregressive Part
  • Recurrent Continuous Translation Models
  • Neural Machine Translation
  • Attention Mechanism
deep learning model architecture attention mechanism mixture-of-experts sparsely-gated feed-forward neural networks gating network load-balancing MultiModel encoder
